text: Hinsdale is a village in Cook and DuPage counties in the U.S. state of Illinois. Hinsdale is a western suburb of Chicago. The population was 17,395 at the 2020 census, most of whom lived in DuPage County. ==References== ==Other websites== *Village of Hinsdale official website Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Settlements in DuPage County, Illinois
title: Hinsdale, Illinois
